question: I had my gall bladder removed by lyposcoptic surgery in Feb 2008, I also have type 1 diabetes, I have a consist pain in my gall bladder area and in my right rib cage area around to my mid back area, I have had catscan and HIDA scans and they still can not find anything wrong but the pain is still there getting worser and more stronger what else ahould they be testing me for ????????????
title: Unexplained
